Title: Dual stack host trying to connect to IPv6 in apt-get update
Description:
I've built a small lab on VBox. It includes a dual stacked host that get's quad-a records through IPv4 and than tries to connect to the IPv6 host (don't have IPv6 connectivity though).

I use it to find out timeouts on resolvable but non-reachable IPv6 hosts.
8 seconds delay on this one...
